scripts.reveal:css: cat ./node_modules/reveal.js/dist/reveal.css | cleancss -O2 -o www/vendor/reveal.css && cat ./node_modules/reveal.js/dist/theme/night.css | grep -v -E "^@import" | grep -v -E "font-family:.*?sans-serif" | cleancss -O2 -o www/vendor/night.css && cat ./node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/highlight/zenburn.css | cleancss -O2 -o www/vendor/zenburn.css
scripts.reveal:js: uglifyjs ./node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/markdown/markdown.js --compress --mangle --output www/vendor/markdown.js && uglifyjs ./node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/highlight/highlight.js --compress --mangle --output www/vendor/highlight.js && uglifyjs ./node_modules/reveal.js/dist/reveal.js --compress --mangle --output www/vendor/reveal.js
scripts.reveal: mkdir -p www/vendor && npm run reveal:css && npm run reveal:js
